TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
No, you surposed to point the front of it directly at your face

how can I get my dog to fly in space?

volunteer him

how does one see without eyes

try googleing it

how can I fly?

By visiting www.airfrance.com, choosing deparature location, arrival location, giving credit card info, going to an airport, boarding the plane.

How do I use my brain?

By dancing.

How to rocket jump?

Strap yourself to a booster.

How to breathe?

Grab air and eat it, then spit it back out. Like gum.

Where's your head at?

Me head is inside me headphones right now.

Me wants to know if have me head inside headphones will magnetize me brains.

Yes it will, and you will become supreme overlord of Gallifrey.

How do I travel to Equestria?

You must learn to use your eyes

How does one eat.

By getting hungry.

Why haven't space agencies invented part-clipping and air-hogging yet?

Because no one has been able to hack into the Matrix yet.

Why do I feel like people are constantly watching me?

Because we are constantly watching you.

Why does everybody listen to pop?

by screaming

how does someone wake up

By waking up, it's easy.

How to reincarnate?

First and foremost you need to die. After that, fairy-tales HAVE to be true.

How does one win a rock paper scissors game?

By bribing the god so that he favors you.

How does one escape the NSA?

You don't. They just watch you all day. Meanwhile in Britain, we drink tea and do what we want free(ish)ly.

Why do the NSA try to screw up other countries without permission?

Don't worry, 'cause it is in the name of freedom that NSA busts everybody's freedom. Also, if they asked for permission they'd have to bribe too much politicians around the world, thus worsening the already ailing murican economy.

Why does ONU's Security Council exists if there's douche-bag countries that can veto everything?

Diplomatic job creation

Why am I here?

Because of your mom.

Why did I memorize 135 decimal places of pi and forget 85?

Cause your brain knows it's a useless thing to memorize.

Why does Tolkien's work is so awesome?

because they contain my precious *reads lord of the rings in a dark corner*

who are "they"

They are ZOOOL!

How do i cook deh waffles

You get a rocket and put the waffles behind the rocket while putting the rocket a full thrust. DONE!!

How do I turn on my computer?
